1_154jAWx5PDRmvF4txGHo4Edw1BpduhDyvw.body:
> [nofish](#comment_441_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Unpack & Run installation method now also added for Linux & OSX: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet
> Automatic Tor downloading is not available on this platforms yet, but if anyone able to create a portable Tor binaries it could be also added.

Wow! Huge thanks on this occasion, your work continues to amaze me.
These simple "1-click-installers" can be huge for users on other distros that aren't comfortable building stuff themselves - Arch fortunately has the AUR for that.
And on Mac / Windows they will attract a lot of not-very-techy folk that just want to see what this is about and maybe run a site or two they wouldn't be comfortable having their name attached to directly, so ZeroNet can work out for people with different levels of tech proficiency.

2_1NdofSgkkvCXPx5FotgoSxX3K78Nn6MDue.body:
Well, why do you provide a clearnet mail here though? 
And you could at least setup a small, one page portfolio from a template, with just a post on 0talk no one will trust you - Which is always a problem.

> [angristan](#comment_55_1MEWJRMLgvofqG9Mbsb2Rc4hFFyv7HeRx7): FYI this is the real website. http://www.soyoustart.com/fr/serveurs-essential/

1_1LnyrYbdxDU1K78nEYVZkfJ1Q4SYP1ukFV.body:
> [thevideovault](#comment_8_1DfkDpkeDXGbHJ2ZT31DPvYr5xR59Jr8BA): Adding my vote AGAINST the addition of a downvote button. All it does is make popular posts get pushed down the page. If a post has people talking, it should be on top.

True! Controversy is as legit as anything else. I don't think that adding a downvote  button would do any good.
